remarks: Axiom of Bundling (intuitionistic logic axiom ax-bnd).  In classical logic, this and ~ axi12 are fairly straightforward consequences of ~ axc9 .  But in intuitionistic logic, it is not easy to add the extra ` A. x ` to ~ axi12 and so we treat the two as separate axioms. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 22-Mar-2018.)
statement: axbnd $p |- ( A. z z = x \/ ( A. z z = y \/ A. x A. z ( x = y -> A. z x = y ) ) ) $.
